When it comes to content writing or blogging in this day and age, your content should not only be entertaining, engaging and relevant, but it needs to be something that your visitors want to read and even share with their friends in social media. It is important to note that you will enjoy writing more if you are emotionally invested in your niche or topic. Of course, everyone has a process for writing, and so, it's imperative to develop and stick to a process that will help you post good content and in a friendly manner. Beauty is a huge niche and thankfully one that is high traffic. You therefore will want to niche down. You can choose beauty tips for moms, or beauty tips for working moms etc. You can use a tool like a kwfinder to get more keywords. I would encourage you to think about the problems that your audience will be facing and write great articles on that. For example, some of the problems that your readers will want solutions to is beauty tips for oily skin, tips for those who have pimples etc. You can later create your own products eg an ebook on the same and sell it to them.
